description: A Greek influenced salad that is fresh, crunchy and refreshing.
keywords: Greek salad,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Feta & Black Olive Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small iceberg lettuce, torn, washed and drained
1 stalk celery, leaves removed and sliced
100g black olives, pitted and halved or sliced
1 small red onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a mixing bowl and serve immediately.
